markdownRemark.html:
You don't need to redo the entire draw. You can resend the email to the participant. Just follow these steps: enter the draw group > tap on the participant who didn't receive the draw > tap on "resend email" > resend. This way, the participant will receive the email again.

Please also check if the participant's email was written correctly. It's also worth asking them to check if the email went to the SPAM folder... This can happen sometimes!

Did we help you? If you continue to have problems, just get in touch. We are always available!

Happy Secret Santa!

frontmatter.title: HOW TO RESEND EMAIL TO A PARTICIPANT
